Magister Dieter: These memories bring me such pain... Well, you'll find out soon enough so I might as well tell you. I stole the books. Master crossed the line that day. I was enraged when he told me I should consider being a farmer... I stole the books that night to spite him. I hid the books in a very safe place. I wanted to get Master into trouble... But it got complicated. Master flew into such a rage that, fearing for my life, I went to retrieve the books but they were gone!
